featured.text: What is the purpose of this passage? (A) To point out the challenges of the modern lifestyle.
Over the years, the fearless tribesmen have stood strong against slavery, and resisted the urging of the Kenyan and Tanzanian governments to adopt a more modern lifestyle.
You needn’t worry about the harm of a sedentary lifestyle because you exercise regularly, right?

definition.zh_def: 生活方式；個人或群體的生活習慣和價值觀。
definition.en_def: The way in which a person or group lives, including their habits, attitudes, and values.
definition.example: She adopted a healthier lifestyle by exercising regularly and eating nutritious foods.
